Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.swing

Class SwingUtils

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.SwingUtils
public abstract class SwingUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class contains a set of useful methods to use in the Swing-based applications.

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
LastUpdate:
0.0.4

    This interface describes callback for processing unknown action string

    static interface  SwingUtils.WalkCallback
    This interface describes callback for walking on the swing component's tree

  • Method Details

    • walkDown

      public static ContinueMode walkDown​(java.awt.Component node, SwingUtils.WalkCallback callback)

      Walk on the swing components tree

      Parameters:
      node - root node to walk from
      callback - callback to process nodes
      Returns:
      the same last continue mode (can't be null)

    • children

      public static java.lang.Iterable<java.awt.Component> children​(java.awt.Component component) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Make iterable for all children of the given component

      Parameters:
      component - component to make children iterable for
      Returns:
      iterable for children. Can be empty but not null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when argument is null

    • findComponentByName

      public static java.awt.Container findComponentByName​(java.awt.Component node, java.lang.String name) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Find component in the component tree by it's name

      Parameters:
      node - root node to seek component
      name - component name
      Returns:
      component found or null when missing
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when root node is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when name to seek is null or empty

    • addPrefix2ComponentNames

      public static void addPrefix2ComponentNames​(java.awt.Component node, java.lang.String prefix) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Add prefixes to all the names components in container

      Parameters:
      node - root component to add prefix to it's content names
      prefix - prefix to all
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - root component is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - prefix to add is null or empty
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • prepareRenderer

      public static javax.swing.JComponent prepareRenderer​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata metadata, Localizer localizer, FieldFormat.ContentType content, JComponentMonitor monitor) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, LocalizationException, SyntaxException

      Prepare renderer for the given meta data and field format

      Parameters:
      metadata - meta data to prepare renderer for
      localizer - localizer for the given control
      content - field content format
      monitor - field monitor
      Returns:
      component prepared
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when any parameters are null
      LocalizationException - when there are problems with localizers
      SyntaxException - on format errors for the given control

    • toJComponent

      public static <T extends javax.swing.JComponent> T toJComponent​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node, java.lang.Class<T> awaited) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Build JComponent child by it's model description. Awaited classes can be JMenuBar, JPopupMenu or JToolBar only

      Type Parameters:
      T - awaited JComponent type
      Parameters:
      node - metadata to build component for
      awaited - awaited class for returned component
      Returns:
      returned component
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - on any nulls in the parameter's list
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - unsupported class to build component.

    • putToScreen

      public static boolean putToScreen​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata metadata, java.lang.Object content, java.awt.Container uiRoot) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, ContentException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Assign value of pointed argument to it's screen presentation

      Parameters:
      metadata - metadata to point argument to
      content - object instance with value will be got from
      uiRoot - any root of screen presentation
      Returns:
      true is assignment was successful
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - on any null arguments
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - content instance is not annotated with @LocaleResource
      ContentException - exception on extracting data or storing it to screen
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • getFromScreen

      public static boolean getFromScreen​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata metadata, java.awt.Component uiRoot, java.lang.Object content) throws ContentException, java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Read value from screen presentation and assign it to instance value for pointed argument

      Parameters:
      metadata - metadata to point argument to
      uiRoot - any root of screen presentation
      content - object instance with value will be stored from
      Returns:
      true is assignment was successful
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - on any null arguments
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - content instance is not annotated with @LocaleResource
      ContentException - exception on extracting data or storing it to the instance
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • prepareHtmlMessage

      public static java.lang.String prepareHtmlMessage​(LoggerFacade.Severity severity, java.lang.String format, java.lang.Object... parameters) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Prepare message in HTML format to show it in the JTextComponent controls

      Parameters:
      severity - message severity
      format - message format (see String.format(String, Object...)
      parameters - additional parameters
      Returns:
      HTML representation of the message
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when any parameters are null

    • refreshLocale

      public static void refreshLocale​(java.awt.Component root, java.util.Locale oldLocale, java.util.Locale newLocale) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, LocalizationException

      Refresh localization content for all the GUI components tree. The method recursively walks on all the UI component tree, but doesn't walk down if the current UI component implements Localizer.LocaleChangeListener interface. All the implementers of this interface must refresh it's own content by self

      Parameters:
      root - root of the GUI components to refresh localization
      oldLocale - old locale
      newLocale - new locale
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
      LocalizationException - in any localization errors

    • assignActionKey

      public static void assignActionKey​(javax.swing.JComponent component, javax.swing.KeyStroke keyStroke, java.awt.event.ActionListener listener, java.lang.String actionId) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Assign key to process action on component

      Parameters:
      component - component to assign key to
      keyStroke - keystroke to assign
      listener - action listener to call
      actionId - action string to associate with the keystroke
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - any parameters are null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - some parameters are invalid

      Center main window on the screen

      Parameters:
      frame - main window
      fillPercent - filling percent on the screen. Must be in the range 0.0f..1.0f
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if frame is null

    • assignActionListeners

      public static void assignActionListeners​(javax.swing.JComponent root, java.lang.Object entity)

      Prepare action listeners to call methods marked with OnAction annotation

      Parameters:
      root - root component to assign listeners to
      entity - object to call it's annotated methods

    • assignActionListeners

      public static void assignActionListeners​(javax.swing.JComponent root, java.lang.Object entity, SwingUtils.FailedActionListenerCallback onUnknown)

      Prepare action listeners to call methods marked with OnAction annotation

      Parameters:
      root - root component to assign listeners to
      entity - object to call it's annotated methods
      onUnknown - callback to process missing actions

    • assignActionListeners

      public static <T> void assignActionListeners​(javax.swing.JComponent root, T entity, FormManager<?,​T> manager)

      Prepare action listeners to call ActionFormManager.onAction(Object, Object, String, Object) method

      Type Parameters:
      T - any entity is used for form manager
      Parameters:
      root - component with action sources inside
      entity - instance to call onAction for
      manager - form manager to process action on entity
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • buildAnnotatedActionListener

      public static java.awt.event.ActionListener buildAnnotatedActionListener​(java.lang.Object entity) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.NullPointerException

      Build ActionListener to call methods marked with OnAction annotation

      Parameters:
      entity - marked instance to call methods in
      Returns:
      action listener built
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when no entity methods are marked with OnAction
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when entity reference is null

    • buildAnnotatedActionListener

      public static java.awt.event.ActionListener buildAnnotatedActionListener​(java.lang.Object entity, SwingUtils.FailedActionListenerCallback onUnknown) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.NullPointerException

      Build ActionListener to call methods marked with OnAction annotation

      Parameters:
      entity - marked instance to call methods in
      onUnknown - callback to process missing actions
      Returns:
      action listener built
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when no entity methods are marked with OnAction
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when entity reference is null

    • buildAnnotatedActionListener

      public static java.awt.event.ActionListener buildAnnotatedActionListener​(java.lang.Object entity, SwingUtils.FailedActionListenerCallback onUnknown, LoggerFacade logger) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.NullPointerException

      Build ActionListener to call methods marked with OnAction annotation

      Parameters:
      entity - marked instance to call methods in
      onUnknown - callback to process missing actions
      logger - logger facade to print errors to
      Returns:
      action listener built
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when no entity methods are marked with OnAction
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when entity reference is null

    • buildEnabledGroup

      public static void buildEnabledGroup​(javax.swing.AbstractButton leader, javax.swing.JComponent... members)

      Build enable group on the screen. When group leader is turned on, all it's members will be enabled. When group leader is turned off, all it's members will be disabled

      Parameters:
      leader - group leader (usually JCheckBox)
      members - members of the group

    • showCreoleHelpWindow

      public static void showCreoleHelpWindow​(java.awt.Component owner, java.net.URI helpContent) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.NullPointerException

      Show Creole-based help

      Parameters:
      owner - help window owner
      helpContent - help reference
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when any parameter is null

    • locateRelativeToAnchor

      public static java.awt.Point locateRelativeToAnchor​(int xPosition, int yPosition, int popupWidth, int popupHeight)

      Calculate location of left-top corner for the window to fit in into screen.

      Parameters:
      xPosition - x-coordinate of window anchor in the screen coordinates (for example, mouse hot spot)
      yPosition - y-coordinate of window anchor in the screen coordinates (for example, mouse hot spot)
      popupWidth - width of the window to fit
      popupHeight - height of the window to fit
      Returns:
      left-top location of the window in the screen coordinates. If any moving is not required, returns window anchor coordinates
      Since:
      0.0.3
